title: Rahu Transit in the 2nd House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the second house intensifies focus on wealth, speech, and self-worth for Leo ascendants. Desire for rapid financial growth rises, bringing unconventional earning ideas and sharp communication. While gains can fluctuate, disciplined planning stabilizes outcomes. Speech carries strong impactâ€”used wisely, it attracts opportunities; used impulsively, it creates conflict. Align ambition with values to turn volatility into sustainable growth.

sections.heading: Career
points: Sales, media, or tech roles favored

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Words can heal or hurt quickly

closing: This transit tests values through desire. When ambition is disciplined, Rahu transforms volatility into lasting financial confidence.
